text:
[Verse]
Walking through the midnight
Streetlights glow and fade
Raindrops dancing softly
In this city maze

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the alley
Echoes call my name
Footsteps in the shadows
Everything’s the same

[Chorus]
Echoes in the rain
City lights remain
Searching for a sign
Lost but feeling fine

[Verse 3]
Windows gently open
Curtains wave hello
Silhouettes are dreaming
In their silent show

[Chorus]
Echoes in the rain
City lights remain
Searching for a sign
Lost but feeling fine

[Bridge]
Heartbeats under street lamps
Whispers in the dark
In this living landscape
Loneliness set apart
title: Echoes in the Rain
